mapper.select: SELECT id, student_id, username, password_hash, account_status, last_login, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by FROM t_user_auth WHERE username = #{username} AND account_status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT id, student_id, username, password_hash, account_status, last_login, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by FROM t_user_auth WHERE student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_auth ( student_id, username, password_hash, account_status, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by ) VALUES ( #{studentId}, #{username}, #{passwordHash}, #{accountStatus}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy} )
